episodes.title: The Ripper Crew: The Most Disturbing Cult Killers in American History | Serial Killer Documentary
episodes.description:
True crime documentary on the Chicago Ripper Crew — Robin Gecht’s satanic cult of murder and terror.

In the early 1980s, Chicago was haunted by one of the most disturbing satanic cults in American history.

Led by Robin Gecht, the Ripper Crew — Edward Spreitzer, and brothers Thomas and Andrew Kokoraleis — prowled the streets, abducting women and committing some of the most shocking and horrific crimes imaginable.

Gaining their name from Jack the Ripper, this cult of self-proclaimed satanists carried out acts of unimaginable depravity — crimes so twisted that one detective later said they made “Manson look like a Boy Scout.”

This full true crime documentary investigates how a group of ordinary men became the most disturbing cult killers in American history.

This is the story... of Robin Gecht & The Chicago Ripper Crew.

episodes.title: The Narcosatanists | The Story of Cult Leader & Serial Killer Adolfo de Jesús Constanzo
episodes.description:
Discover the chilling story of cult leader and serial killer Adolfo de Jesús Constanzo in this true crime documantary about the Narcosatanists.

After Mark Kilroy vanished without a trace in Mexico, the search for him led authorities to the door of a drug Cartel harbouring a dark secret.

Led by a violent cult leader practicing dark magic rituals, the Cartel routinely carried out human sacrifice and horrific, disturbing occult rituals they believed led to the success of their drug empire.

This is the shocking true story of the Narcosatanists.
